Title: Relates to establishing the New York small business relief fund
Summary: Establishes the New York small business relief fund consisting of monetary penalties imposed by the state liquor authority to provide grants to small businesses which have suffered economic hardship as a result of the COVID-19 pandemic.
LawCode: Add ยง99-ii, St Fin L
ActClause: AN ACT to amend the state finance law, in relation to establishing the New York small business relief fund
